column5: I have a family vacation set from April 12-19th or so in Hilton Head. Right on the beach, hopefully the weather is good and the beer is plenty. My uncle who's condo we are renting, and lives nearby, will be taking us out on a redfish charter... But, I was wondering if there was any shore fishing nearby that I'd be able to get into. Salt or Freshwater, I'll get myself a a permit for whichever seems best. Any ideas anyone?  Thanks for any advice.

I was there a few years ago, always people on the beach after 5, shark fishing. Also, check out the tackle shop in the salty dog complex - they do kayak fishing for redfish near the golf course.  Good luck  Andrew
Thanks buddy! I shall check'r out. Shark fishing on the beach sounds like I'd need some extra heavy tackle. Would be pretty epic though.
